      • installCleanupHook

        private static void installCleanupHook​(Path certificatePath,
                                       Path privateKeyPath)
        Makes sure to delete partially generated certificates. Does nothing if both certificate and private key have been generated successfully. The hook should only be installed prior to generation of self-signed certificate, and not if certificates already exist.

        private void writePem​(String type,

               throws IOException
